body_text:
Why do anime/manga characters have big eyes? Going as far back as Astroboy, anime and manga characters have had big eyes.
What is basis of this trend? How and where did this originate?

Why are most people in anime white or European-looking (instead of Japanese)? Anatomically speaking Europeans don't look like that either. But most of the people look more European than Japanese, at least it seems to me ... Maybe it's the round eyes? And the non-black hair in some cases?
